description:
Compact drybags to keep your electronics and essentials, safe and dry. Made from a tough polyurethane, these accessory cases can stand up to life on the trail, the water, or anywhere you need them. With both roll-top and a hook-and-loop closure, these little cases really seal out the elements.

  • Touchscreen compatible, so you don’t have to expose your phone to the weather
  • IPX8 waterproofing can be submerged to 10m for up to 1h, so rain, snow, or paddling spray are no issue
  • Rugged UV-resistant, crease-resistant PVC-free TPU
  • Dual lash points on top
  • Neck strap included
name: Sea To Summit TPU Accessory Case - Unisex
